overview: In two parallel stories, having relationships is hard for Júlia and Laura, two young artists who are trying to find themselves in the world. Laura has issues with anxiety and Júlia can't handle other people, so she stays away from them. When a chance for finding love knocks on their door, they are gonna have to learn to accept themselves, so then they can accept the opportunity.
tagline: Two misfit artists deal with their daily lives and the search for love. In these two parallel stories, they must overcome their fears and anxieties when the opportunity to live the romance they've been waiting for knocks on their door.
title: Coincidental Parallels
